virtual char const * what () const=0 throw ()

Detailed Description

The base class for all exceptions thrown by CUPP.

Author:
Jens Breitbart
Version:
0.1
Date:
13.06.2007
Note:
This class is pure virtual.
It is based on the std::exception and can be handled the same way.
